item.title: 腾讯、Hillhouse 等十多家 PE 和科技公司进入星巴克中国投资候选名单
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士透露，星巴克公司已将包括私募股权投资公司和科技公司在内的十几家机构列入第二轮投资中国业务的候选名单。【原文：Starbucks Corp. has shortlisted about a dozen parties including private equity firms and technology companies into the second round of a process to invest in its China business, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.description: 中国开发商奇幻城娱乐控股集团有限公司（Fantasia Holdings Group Co.【原文：Chinese developer Fantasia Holdings Group Co. plans to release a new restructuring plan in the coming weeks after previous attempts fizzled, people familiar with the matter said, underscoring the years-long struggle of builders to move past an unprecedented property crisis.】

item.description:
在《梅林谈钱》（Merryn Talks Money）一书中，斯特凡-布杰纳（Stéphane Boujnah）认为特朗普将 "大轮换 "转变为 "全球信任重新分配"，而欧洲正在从中获益。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Stéphane Boujnah argues Trump transformed the “great rotation” into a “global reallocation of trust,” and Europe is reaping the benefits.

item.title: 世界重量级小麦出口寥寥无几
item.description: 包括俄罗斯、乌克兰和欧盟在内的主要小麦发货国在新季开局缓慢，因为恶劣天气和农民囤积库存抑制了出口。【原文：Top wheat shippers, including Russia, Ukraine and the European Union, got off to a slow start to the new season as exports were curbed by adverse weather and stockpiling by farmers.】

item.title: 空调制造商奥克斯据称计划 9 月在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的空调制造商之一奥克斯电器有限公司正计划最早于 9 月在香港上市，融资额可能达到 6 亿至 8 亿美元。【原文：Aux Electric Co., one of China’s top makers of air conditioners, is targeting to go public in Hong Kong as early as September in a listing that could raise $600 million to $800 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国政府发出警告后，阿里巴巴和美团誓言停止价格战
item.description: 美团和阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司周五誓言遏制 "无序竞争"，停止以价格为基础的竞争，这种竞争已威胁到利润率，并引发了政府机构的警告。【原文：Meituan and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. vowed Friday to curb “disorderly competition” and cease the price-based rivalry that’s threatened to pressure margins and prompted warnings from government agencies.】

item.title: 中国称美国利用微软旧漏洞发动网络攻击
item.description: 中国指责美国利用微软公司电子邮件服务器的漏洞窃取军事数据，并对中国国防部门发动网络攻击。【原文：China accused the US of exploiting a flaw in Microsoft Corp.’s email servers to steal military data and launch cyberattacks on its defense sector.】

item.title: 日本寻求削减汽车关税，确保汽车制造商的竞争力
item.description: 日本首席贸易谈判代表表示，日本将继续向美国施压，要求美国按照贸易协议中的承诺，将汽车和汽车零部件的关税削减至 15%，并努力确保日本的汽车制造商在与竞争对手的竞争中保持竞争力。【原文：Japan will keep pressing the US to cut tariffs on cars and auto parts to 15% as promised in a trade deal and work to ensure the nation’s automakers remain competitive against their rivals, according to the nation’s chief trade negotiator.】

item.title: 日本加藤对日元创三月以来最弱表示担忧
item.description: 日本财务大臣表示，他对日元的走势感到担忧，在日本央行发出鸽派利率信息后，日元已贬值到 3 月份的水平。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister said he’s worried by movements in the yen, which weakened to levels last seen in March following dovish messaging on interest rates from the Bank of Japan.】

item.title: 柬埔寨将在美国贸易协议中取消关税，购买波音喷气机
item.description: 柬埔寨副首相孙占托（Sun Chanthol）表示，柬埔寨将取消对美国商品征收的关税，并承诺购买多达 20 架波音公司的 737 Max 喷气机，以缩小与华盛顿的贸易差距。【原文：Cambodia will scrap tariffs on US goods and pledged to buy as many as 20 Boeing Co. 737 Max jets in a bid to narrow its trade gap with Washington, according to Deputy Prime Minister Sun Chanthol.】

item.title: 全球信贷利差触及 2007 年低点，高盛呼吁谨慎行事
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. credit strategists are urging clients to hedge risks as yield premiums on global corporate notes tightened to their lowest since 2007 this week.】

item.title: 丰田、本田应对特朗普汽车关税和日元走强带来的冲击
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）和本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. and Honda Motor Co. earnings will paint a mixed picture as a stronger yen and US auto tariffs eat into profit, despite resilient unit sales.】

item.title: 二战以来美国最高关税将抑制经济增长，加剧通货膨胀
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的互惠征税可能会拖累经济增长，推高物价，同时打击全球经济。【原文：President Donald Trump’s reciprocal levies will likely weigh on economic growth and push up prices while hammering the global economy, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，亚洲工厂前景降至大流行病以来最低点
item.description: 在特朗普长期征收关税的背景下，东南亚地区的制造商对未来增长的乐观程度达到了自疫情爆发以来的最低点，尽管上个月的经济活动有所改善。【原文：Manufacturers across Southeast Asia turned the least optimistic about future growth since the depths of the pandemic amid Trump’s long tariff rollout, even as activity improved last month.】

item.title: 民间调查显示中国工厂活动意外萎缩
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，7 月份中国制造业活动意外出现环比萎缩，这使得未来一段时间的经济发展势头更加令人担忧。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity unexpectedly contracted in July from a month ago, according to a private survey, adding to worrying signs about the economy’s momentum in the period ahead.】

item.title: 日本零售交易商大量押注日经指数看跌，引发疑虑
item.description: 随着日本股市飙升至历史新高，散户投资者正在加大看跌押注，这凸显了市场对日本股市涨势持续性的疑虑。【原文：As Japanese stocks soar to record highs, retail investors are ramping up bearish bets, highlighting lingering doubts about the rally’s staying power.】

item.title: 特朗普出人意料地征收关税后，铜价将出现单周下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普做出了不对精炼产品征收关税的令人震惊的决定，交易商们急于预订伦敦金属交易所的储存空间来存放金属，铜价本周有望下跌。【原文：Copper was on track for a weekly fall, as President Donald Trump’s shock decision not to place tariffs on refined products had traders rushing to book up London Metal Exchange storage space to house the metal.】

item.title: 新西兰寻求复审对美出口 15%的关税
item.description: 新西兰贸易部长托德-麦克雷（Todd McClay）表示，新西兰将推动美国总统唐纳德-特朗普降低对美国出口产品征收的15%关税。【原文：New Zealand will push for a reduction in the 15% tariff rate imposed on exports to the US by President Donald Trump, Trade Minister Todd McClay said.】

item.title: 韩国股市下跌 3.1%，税收改革计划令投资者恐慌
item.description: 在韩国政府提出对企业和股票投资者征收更高的税以增加收入后，韩国股票基准指数创下了自 4 月初以来的最大跌幅。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark tumbled the most since early April after the government proposed higher taxes on corporations and stock investors in a bid to shore up revenue.】

item.title: 安盛接近以 10 亿欧元收购意大利 Prima Assicurazioni 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Axa SA 接近以约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）（包括债务）的价格收购意大利汽车保险公司 Prima Assicurazioni。【原文：Axa SA is close to acquiring Italian car insurer Prima Assicurazioni for about €1 billion ($1.1 billion) including debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 台积电股价错位达到 16 年来最严重水平
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司的美国存托凭证与其在台北上市的股票之间的价格差距飙升至 16 年多来最大的水平，再次引发了人们对围绕人工智能的兴奋情绪可能过热的担忧。【原文：The price gap between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s American depositary receipts and its Taipei-listed shares surged to the widest level in more than 16 years, reigniting concerns that the euphoria surrounding artificial intelligence may be overheating.】

item.title: 美国关税协议达成前韩国出口势头不减
item.description: 韩国的出口在 7 月份再次攀升，这很可能是受到了企业在美国提高关税前抢占先机的支撑。【原文：South Korea’s exports climbed again in July, likely supported by front-loading as companies sought to get ahead of an increase in US tariffs.】

item.title: 机器人成为中国科技股上涨的新驱动力，涨幅达 75
item.description: 今年早些时候，DeepSeek 公司在人工智能领域的进步引发了市场反弹，投资者正在为这一反弹寻找新的催化剂。【原文：Chinese robotics stocks are drawing fresh market attention as investors look for new catalysts for the rally sparked earlier this year by DeepSeek’s advances in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Mac 销量和 iPhone 升级推动苹果在华卷土重来
item.description: 苹果公司公布了其两年来在中国的首次销售增长，称新 Mac 电脑和城市居民手机用户的需求助推了销售反弹。【原文：Apple Inc. posted its first sales growth in China in two years, saying that new Mac computers and demand from city-dwelling phone customers helped fuel the rebound.】

item.title: 特朗普在最后期限前对马来西亚出口产品征收 19% 的关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将对马来西亚出口到美国的产品征收 19% 的关税，低于他在 7 月份威胁要征收的 25% 的税率。【原文：President Donald Trump will impose a 19% tariff on exports from Malaysia to the US, a lower rate than the 25% levy he threatened in July.】

item.title: 市场密切关注特朗普的关税举措，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 白宫公布了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对贸易伙伴征收的关税税率，该税率将于周五生效。【原文：Gold held an advance — but remained on track for a weekly loss — as the White House unveiled President Donald Trump’s tariff rates on trading partners that are set to take effect on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普将对从瑞士进口的商品征收 39% 的关税
item.description: 根据唐纳德-特朗普总统周四晚间签署的一项行政命令，他将对从瑞士进口的商品征收 39% 的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump will impose a 39% levy on imports from Switzerland, according to an executive order he signed Thursday night.】
